content: chinese paper dragon amigurumi pattern by tsui-sie baker-wong @tsuisie wong skill level intermediate copyright © 2024 tsui-sie baker-wong - @tsuisie wong 1 introduction to celebrate this year s chinese new year 2024 for the year of the dragon 10th february 2024 28th january 2025 i have designed this chinese paper dragon based on my own memories of playing with them when frequenting chinatown people born in a year of the dragon are considered to be idealistic and are perfectionists notes the pattern is written in us terminology and is worked in continuous rounds unless otherwise stated approximate size of the chinese paper dragon using the listed materials below is 4cm 1½inches tall by 24cm 9½inches in length this crochet pattern is for personal use only please do not redistribute or resell it in any form you may sell the finished product made from this pattern only if you credit tsui-sie baker-wong or @tsuisie wong as the original designer contact if you have any questions regarding the pattern please feel free to message me on instagram @tsuisie wong or email me tsuisie@bakerwong com copyright © 2024 tsui-sie baker-wong -
